pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: その日時はコーチに都合がよかった。
lessons.indonesian: The time and date suited our coach.

lessons.japanese: コーチは選手達が泳ぐのをじっと見ていた。
lessons.indonesian: The coach was waiting for the players to swim.

lessons.japanese: コーチは選手たちに１日５マイルはしらせた。
lessons.indonesian: The coach made the players run five miles a day.

lessons.japanese: コーチはボブをいい選手だと思っている。
lessons.indonesian: The coach considers Bob a good player.

lessons.japanese: コーチが助言をしてくれた。
lessons.indonesian: The coach gave me some advice.
